segments.text: What can I do for you , Miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you a bus tour ? I have one day left so I think the best way is to take a bus tour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right.The bus tour is really efficient and cheap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time does the next bus leave ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 9 : OO . Don't worry , Miss , we have buses every 15 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
